channel.title: Comments on: 5 Questions with Mala Mahadevan
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Raja
item.dc:creator: Raja
item.description: Thanks Jes for writing about one of the finest human beings I know! And such joy to read
item.content:encoded: Thanks Jes for writing about one of the finest human beings I know! And such joy to read

item.title: By: Raja
item.dc:creator: Raja
item.description: Thank you so much Jes! Malathi- as she is known to us is an amazing, caring & giving human being. Having known her over 20 years, I am pleased to see the way she has grown & evolved. Yes she should write a lot
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much Jes! Malathi- as she is known to us is an amazing, caring & giving human being. Having known her over 20 years, I am pleased to see the way she has grown & evolved. Yes she should write a lot
